name: Warsaw 2022
description:
This game was made only for entertainment purposes, and it was not meant to offend anyone. This game was based on hong kong 97 from 1995 which was one of the worst and dumbest games ever made. It was also politically incorrect and dumb as hell.

In Warsaw 2022 you play as a Mariusz Pudzianowski (former polish strongman) relative called Jan (who looks like Bogusław Linda - polish movie actor). Your goal is to kill as many of antifa and nationalists as you can. There is also a boss, which shows when you have 500 points. Your enemies take 1-3 bullets depending on enemy type.

The music loop is "Krystian Pudzianowski - dawaj na ring".

How to play:

You control your character with arrows and shoot with spacebar. You can pause the game by pressing P
